channel.title: [SFM] Kingdom Conflicts No one wins
channel.description:
[color=#00FF7F]W[/color][color=#06EE79]e[/color][color=#0DDD73]l[/color][color=#13CD6D]c[/color][color=#1ABC68]o[/color][color=#20AC62]m[/color][color=#279B5C]e[/color] = Hello and welcome to this game
[color=#00FF7F]R[/color][color=#09E777]u[/color][color=#12D06F]l[/color][color=#1BB967]e[/color][color=#24A25F]s[/color] =
[details="Rules!"] 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. Even when your dead! 4. Do not screenshot/quote/anything similar private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Editing is allowed if you edit before the pen you are ~~spared~~ ok. Also no deleting posts. 8. Do not post during night. The thread will not be locked due to announcements and stuff. 9. You can't Angleshoot! [/details]
[color=#00FF7F]G[/color][color=#05F07A]a[/color][color=#0BE275]m[/color][color=#11D370]e[/color][color=#17C56B]p[/color][color=#1CB666]l[/color][color=#22A861]a[/color][color=#28995C]y[/color] =
[details=Gameplay!] [details="Day/Night Cycles"] * Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if majority is reached. * Nights will be 24 hour long, or shorter if everyone sent their actions in [/details]
[details="Class Info"] * Actions are done by messaging me * All classes will be used as they are found in your PM (Meaning no loopholes!) * When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it * Normal win cons are in place (mafia, defeat all the town and any neutral who seeks to do you harm, etc.) * You will not know if you are unique or not. * There may or may not be neuts [/details]
[details="Faction Info"] * The scum will be referred to as "mafia" * The town will be referred to as "kingdom" * Neutrals if they exist will simply be known as "neutrals" [/details]
[details="Lynch Mechanics"] * To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" * To unaccuse someone say "/**unvote [player]**" or "**/unvote**" * Majority lynch is in play. * There are no trials however [/details]
[details="Journals/Deathnotes"] * Message me your entire journal/DN, the last draft I receive before you die/kill shall be the one displayed [/details]
[details="Helpful Info"] * This game is NOT bastard * This game may or may not have RNG mechanics * This game may or may not have dead interaction * This game may or may not have hidden mechanics not listed in the OP * This is basically limited feedback game (similarly to EFoL) so if your ability doesn't have notify in it then it notifies no one. [/details]
[/details]
[color=#00FF7F]H[/color][color=#04F47B]o[/color][color=#08E977]w[/color] [color=#10D470]t[/color][color=#14CA6C]o[/color] [color=#1DB565]J[/color][color=#21AA61]o[/color][color=#25A05E]i[/color][color=#29955A]n[/color] =
[details="How To Join"] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want [/details]
[color=#00FF7F]P[/color][color=#06EE79]l[/color][color=#0DDD73]a[/color][color=#13CD6D]y[/color][color=#1ABC68]e[/color][color=#20AC62]r[/color][color=#279B5C]s[/color] = 1. Boss110 2. MaximusPrime 4. Marluxion 6. Margaret 8. Sam17z 9. Gamerpoke 12. ~~CloverPlayer~~ -> Luxy 1. Mathblade 1. Overthebin 1. TheHolySpirit 1. Firekitten 1. Soulshade55r -> 1. BlueSt0rm22 1. Hjasik 1. PoisonedSquid 1. Alice 1. ~~Blizer~~ -> PokemonKidRyan
**Backups:**
Livic.
[color=#00FF7F]G[/color][color=#05F27A]r[/color][color=#0AE576]a[/color][color=#0FD871]v[/color][color=#14CB6D]e[/color][color=#19BE68]y[/color][color=#1EB164]a[/color][color=#23A45F]r[/color][color=#28975B]d[/color] = HTM - Died N0 - [color=yellow] **Anime Lion** [/color] Sam - Lynched D1 - [color=green] **Snailor I mean uh Sailor** [/color]
[color=#00FF7F]I[/color][color=#02F97D]m[/color][color=#04F47B]p[/color][color=#06EF79]o[/color][color=#08E977]r[/color][color=#0AE475]t[/color][color=#0CDF74]a[/color][color=#0EDA72]n[/color][color=#10D470]t[/color] [color=#14CA6C]G[/color][color=#16C46B]a[/color][color=#19BF69]m[/color][color=#1BBA67]e[/color] [color=#1FAF63]E[/color][color=#21AA61]v[/color][color=#23A560]e[/color][color=#25A05E]n[/color][color=#279A5C]t[/color][color=#29955A]s[/color][color=#2B9058]:[/color] =

item.title: [SFM] Kingdom Conflicts No one wins
item.dc:creator: TheHolySpirit
item.description:
Merchant
Neutral Special

You are a Merchant from the far away shadow neutral kingdom. Your only goal is to trade!

Protection Sphere Of Trade (Day) - No one will be able to visit you tonight. - 1 use.

Trade (Night) - Trade with target player. They will give you some of their abilities/passives in exchange for the special abilities/passives you could give them. - Infinite uses.

Your goal is to trade with at least 3 people

Read full topic
